page.title: 07A PRIMARY SCHOOL,A-IN-M
page.content: Our school is called Nicol Mere County Primary School. It got the name 'Nicol' because when the sun shone down on the mere, it looked like nickle. The school has two buildings, the infants and the juniors. It has about five hundred children and has fourteen classes. The school is situated near Roman Road. The road got its name because there used to be a Roman road running next to it. It has now got lots of houses on it, mainly old people's houses. There is a playing field around the School.
